title: User login via email authentication
description: Verify that users can successfully log in using valid email and password credentials and that session is established.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid email and password
Submit login form
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to dashboard

title: User login via social authentication providers
description: Confirm that users can successfully log in using supported social login options (e.g., Google, Facebook) and that session is established correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Choose a social login provider and complete authentication flow
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to dashboard

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Ensure system displays appropriate error when user attempts to log in with incorrect email or password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid email or incorrect password
Submit login form
Verify error message is displayed and login is not successful

title: Role-based access control enforcement
description: Verify that users only have access to dashboard features permitted by their RBAC roles.

steps.description: Log in as user with restricted role
Attempt to access admin-only features
Verify access is denied with appropriate message

title: Upload and parse a valid PPTX file
description: Validate that uploading a medium-sized PowerPoint file is processed correctly within 5 seconds extracting text, images, layouts, and animations.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to video project creation
Upload a valid medium-sized PPTX file
Verify parsing is completed within 5 seconds
Verify extracted slide contents, images, animations are correctly displayed in preview

title: Handle corrupted PPTX upload gracefully
description: Ensure system detects corrupted or unsupported PPTX files and displays appropriate error without crashing.

steps.description: Attempt to upload corrupted or unsupported PPTX file
Verify system shows error message indicating invalid file

title: Drag-and-drop slide rearrangement in video editor
description: Confirm that users can rearrange slides via drag-and-drop in the visual editor with immediate preview update and state persistence.

steps.description: Open an existing video project in the editor
Drag a slide to a new position
Verify slide order updates immediately in preview
Refresh page and verify the reordered slides persist

title: Edit slide text and narration properties
description: Validate editing textual content and narration metadata per slide with instant reflection in the preview mode.

steps.description: Select a slide in video editor
Modify text contents and narration parameters
Verify changes are previewed instantly
Save project and reload editor to confirm changes persist

title: Select and preview multiple TTS voice providers
description: Verify user can select voices from ElevenLabs, Azure, Google, and Edge, adjust speed, and play preview audio for slides.

steps.description: Open TTS settings in video editor
Select each TTS provider voice and adjust speed settings
Play audio preview for each selection
Verify preview audio plays correctly without lag or error

title: TTS audio generation completes within target time
description: Ensure text-to-speech audio generation completes within 12 seconds for various voice selections.

steps.description: Request TTS audio generation for sample slide text with different voices
Verify audio is generated and available within 12 seconds

title: Start video rendering job and track progress
description: Validate the asynchronous video rendering pipeline triggers job, sends real-time progress updates, and handles multiple resolutions/codecs.

steps.description: Initiate video render job for a project
Verify rendering job starts successfully and real-time progress updates are received
Verify output video is generated in selected resolution and codec formats

title: Cancel rendering job and verify cleanup
description: Ensure user can cancel an ongoing render job and that system terminates processing and frees resources.

steps.description: Start a render job for a video project
Trigger cancel operation for the render job
Verify rendering stops and no partial files remain
Verify user is notified of cancellation

title: User project lifecycle: create, edit, duplicate, share, delete
description: Verify full management of video projects via dashboard including project creation, editing, duplication, sharing (with link), and deletion.

steps.description: Create a new video project
Edit the project's slides and settings
Duplicate the project
Generate a shareable public link for the project
Delete the original project
Verify each operation completes correctly and project state updates accordingly

title: Compliance template enforcement for Brazilian NRs
description: Confirm that selecting any of the 12 supported NR templates enforces regulatory compliance data entry and generates valid certificates.

steps.description: Select each of the 12 NR templates
Input required company and compliance data
Generate compliant video project and certificate
Verify generated certificate matches NR legal requirements

title: Analytics dashboard displays accurate usage and system metrics
description: Validate that the analytics interface shows correct and up-to-date usage statistics and system health metrics, including error classification.

steps.description: Access analytics dashboard
Verify usage data matches recorded user activity
Verify system health indicators and error classifications are current and accurate

title: File storage integration for upload and public sharing
description: Ensure rendered videos can be uploaded to storage, downloaded by the user, and shared via public URLs securely.

steps.description: Upload rendered video to storage system
Generate public sharing link from dashboard
Access and download the video using generated link
Verify files are accessible, downloadable, and secure as per permissions

title: System availability and recovery under load
description: Test platform uptime and quick recovery within defined RTO (Recovery Time Objective) during simulated load and failure conditions ensuring 99.5% availability.

steps.description: Simulate system load with multiple concurrent users and render jobs
Introduce controlled failure and monitor system recovery
Verify system availability meets 99.5% uptime and recovers within RTO

title: Security standards enforcement including RLS, JWT, HTTPS, input sanitation
description: Verify all security measures including row-level security enforcement, JWT authentication tokens, HTTPS usage, input validation and sanitation, and rate limiting are enforced throughout the platform.

steps.description: Attempt unauthorized data access to validate RLS restrictions
Intercept requests to check JWT token requirements and validations
Access platform via HTTP and confirm redirection/enforcement of HTTPS
Attempt injection attacks or malformed input submissions on forms
Simulate high-frequency requests to test rate limiting
Verify security defenses block unauthorized access and invalid inputs appropriately

title: Video editor UI responsiveness and error handling
description: Validate the video editor interface handles edge cases like very large slide decks and unsupported slide elements gracefully without crashes and provides user guidance on errors.

steps.description: Load a video project with a very large number of slides
Include slides with unsupported or corrupted elements
Verify editor remains responsive and displays appropriate error or warnings

title: Codebase test coverage and lint compliance
description: Ensure automated unit and integration tests cover over 85% of the codebase and that code complies with TypeScript strictness and linting rules.

steps.description: Run test coverage report against codebase
Verify coverage exceeds 85%
Run linting and TypeScript checks
Verify no lint errors and compliance with strict TypeScript setting
